thread.title: Harrison Afful topples Andre Ayew and Asamoah Gyan to win 2014 Sports Writers Footballer of the Year
thread.title_full: Harrison Afful topples Andre Ayew and Asamoah Gyan to win 2014 Sports Writers Footballer of the Year

title: Harrison Afful topples Andre Ayew and Asamoah Gyan to win 2014 Sports Writers Footballer of the Year
text:
Sports News | 4 October 2015 01:40 CET Harrison Afful topples Andre Ayew and Asamoah Gyan to win 2014 Sports Writers Footballer of the Year - www.ghanasoccernet.com Harrison Afful of Ghana during the 2015 Africa Cup of Nations semifinal football match between Ghana and Equatorial Guinea at the Malabo Stadium, Malabo, Equatorial Guinea on 5 February 2015 Â©Gavin Barker/BackpagePix 
US-based defender Harrison Afful has beaten Black Stars teammates Andre Ayew and Asamoah Gyan to be named the 2014 Sports Writers Association of Ghana Footballer of the Year. 
The Columbus Crew right-back was not present at the ceremony which was held the at State Banquet Hall in Accra which was the 40th edition of the awards. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
